definition: with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
to drape over one's shoulders/to open/to unroll/to split open/to spread out
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.chinese: 不要让披头散发的少女。

sentences.english: Mom was stick thin, worn looking and with disheveled hair.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈瘦骨如柴，披头散发，显示出一副疲惫的样子。

sentences.english: With my hair down, so. What shall we do to-morrow?
sentences.chinese: 披头散发，就这样。明天我们将有何勾当？

sentences.english: Allow yourself to mess with your hair in certain occasions.
sentences.chinese: 允许偶尔披头散发，但要注重场合。

sentences.english: Allow occasional disheveled, but to focus on occasion.
sentences.chinese: 允许偶尔披头散发，但要注重场合。

definition: messy hair and dirty face/bad appearance
to have a lifeless look in one's eyes (idiom)
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
lit. with disheveled hair and a dirty face/of unkempt appearance (idiom)
a bloody nose and a swollen face/badly battered
